entry.title: $2000 // Super spacious studio 1 bath
entry.content:
ADD: 401 W 22nd St APT 4B, New York, NY 10011

Inquiries only accepted Via:maxwellbecks24(@)gmaiL com if you want speedy response

This spacious studio is located in a popular boutique.

FEATURES
-Spacious living
-Sleeping area with an over-sized window and cherry wood floors
-The kitchen has a breakfast counter and full-sized appliances, including a dishwasher
-The bathroom has a soaking tub
-FREE GYM
-Storage
-Laundry and a shared roof deck with stunning Manhattan views.

This apartment is pin-drop quiet as its at the back of the building yet centrally located near the High Line, subway, Chelsea Market and all that downtown Manhattan has to offer. The building is also pet-friendly.

Inquiries only accepted Via:maxwellbecks24(@)gmaiL com
